sourcesContent:
My Pets

  • {{pet.name}}
import { Component , OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import { Pet } from '../pet'; import { PetsService } from '../pets.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-pets', templateUrl: './pets.component.html', styleUrls: ['./pets.component.css'] }) export class PetsComponent implements OnInit{ Pets: Pet[] = []; constructor(private PetsService: PetsService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getPets(); } getPets(): void { this.PetsService.getPets() .subscribe(Pets => this.Pets = Pets); } }
